name: Super Debt Speedrun
description:
You’ve had it.

Buy or destry everything in the store and rack up as much debt as possible before the store closes.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Space - Jump

E - Let go of cart

L-Click (Hold) - Pick up item

R-Click (Holding an item) - Throw item

Make sure you click on Scoreboard after the run to post the score!
